alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 5:58PM EDT until June 04 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PASCO AND NORTHEASTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES... At 557 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pebble Creek, or near Temple Terrace, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Busch Gardens, Wesley Chapel, Hillsborough River State Park, Florida State Fairgrounds, Thonotosassa, Pebble Creek, Lutz, and New Tampa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
